arts.ttl: Udinese PK drama: Lucca scores, promptly subbed
arts.sum: Udinese's 1-0 away win over Lecce on Friday was overshadowed by the controversy surrounding Lorenzo Lucca's winning penalty, which angered his teammates and coach.

arts.ttl: Italy star confronted by fuming Udinese teammates after striker defies boss with penalty kick antics
arts.sum: Udinese frontman Lorenzo Lucca opened the scoring in their Serie A clash with Lecce only to find himself substituted moment's later.

arts.ttl: Serie A: Lecce 0-1 Udinese – Nobody pleased with Lucca’s winner
arts.sum: Udinese picked up their third win in four Serie A matches with a 1-0 victory...

arts.ttl: Udinese players fight over penalty duty: Lucca scores and immediately subbed off
arts.sum: Lorenzo Lucca went against team orders to take a penalty during the Serie A match...

arts.ttl: Serie A: Lecce vs. Udinese – Confirmed line-ups and updates
arts.sum: The line-ups are confirmed for the first fixture of the 26th round of Serie A...
